page.title: 08Moss Hall Schools, Finchley
page.content:
On this Nether Street site are 3{ {schools}- Nursery- 150 children 3-5 year olds Infant - 270 children 5-7 year olds Junior - 360 children 7-11 year olds
There is also the{Coach House}for teenagers who need more individualised teaching. Pupils are of many differing {nationalities}and{religions}-most are born in England,but many have parents from,for example,India,Africa,Cyprus or Japan. The different faiths include Christian,Muslim,Hindu,Jewish and Greek Orthodox.Everyone lives and works happily as a large family. The nursery operates in a large 1885 house.The Infant & Junior schools,are almost entirely single storey,built in 1953-3.A swimming pool,built 1973,is to be replaced in 1986.
